data.title: B Long Hold With Shear
data.description: Ensnare or delay Attackers with this simple lineup towards B Long.

data.title: Art Shear + Razorvine Combo Hold
data.description: Use this simple, but powerful combination of utility to contest for Art control.

data.title: Aggressive Mid Arc Rose Contest
data.description: At the start of the round, use this Arc Rose lineup to contest Mid. This also enables your teammates at Art.
